defaultText: MintyMusic is one of 2 bots developed by the CraftMusic App Studios. Unlike its brother “CraftMusic”, MintyMusic stands out with a very high sound quality and incredible stability. MintyMusic is designed from the ground up to stream long music, be it from Spotify, Apple Music, Deezer, SoundCloud or other platforms, we deliver the music in original quality directly to you in the Voice Channel! Enjoy your favorite music together with your friends on Discord.
